entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -28.9°C
Wind: ESE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
